nodes.text: Lieutenant Kollis was a Human male who served in the military of the Galactic Republic during the Galactic War between the Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire. Stationed in Aurek Base on Hoth in 3642 BBY, he dealt with the smuggler who would later be known as the Voidhound, who was working as privateer for the Republic. Kollis first met them while they were stealing long-range sensors from Republic Storage Depot AB-119, having been tricked by Languss Tuno. Later, Kollis asked the Voidhound about the possibility of acquiring the cloaking technology from the White Maw pirates and wished him safe journey afterwards.
